name: The Email (WIP)
description:
Made this in 5-ish days. Never made a game before so don't expect anything great

You get back from work to find you've been sent what looks like a spam email or some kind of joke from someone, but you don't recognise the sender. Explore the endless void, trapped with no way out, is something following you from the shadows or is it just paranoia. 

Controls -

Move - wasd

Interact - e

Restart - r

Quit - escape

Disclaimer - There isn't really much at all, everythings got placeholder assets atm and it isn't finished. 

This is unfinished and an early prototype of a horror i had planned to finish for the Cursed Image Jam, but i started halfway into the jam and kept running into problems. This is also the first "playable" game I've made, I Learnt a lotta things (which took up most of the time) and had fun making this. 

I will be working on this after the jam and hopefully get it all finished soon-ish.

Heres some the images that inspired the game
